long_description: This airy, minimalist, shaped tarp offers weather and sun protection with tons of ventilation. You get 68 sq. ft. of coverage for under 2 lbs. Catenary design increases airflow for added comfort in hot, muggy climates. Ultralight ripstop nylon fabric reduces weight and sheds water with a polyurethane and silicone coating. Can be set up using your own trekking poles, guylines or a combination of both. Features taped seams, reinforced stress points, and ultralight stake loops. Includes stuff sacks, needle stakes and attached guylines with tensioners.
short_description: This airy, minimalist, shaped tarp offers weather and sun protection with tons of ventilation.
